questions.question: ___ am happy.
___ are my friend.
Carlos is tired. ___ wants to rest.
Maria is a teacher. ___ is kind.
The cat is sleeping. ___ is quiet.
Sarah and I are here. ___ are waiting.
John and Mary are neighbors. ___ are friendly.
Peter, will ___ come with us?
My sister loves to read. ___ spends hours with books.
This is my brother. ___ is from Canada.
Mark and I are going to the party. ___ are excited.
Isabella is my best friend. ___ is very funny.
The dog is barking loudly. ___ wants attention.
Tom, ___ should finish your homework.
My parents are on vacation. ___ are in Italy.
Anna and Pedro, ___ will join us later?
The weather is nice today. ___ is sunny.
Lucy is calling you. ___ needs help.
David and Sam are late. ___ will be here soon.
My phone is on the table. ___ is new.
Sarah loves ice cream. ___ eats it every day.
Mike, can ___ help me with this?
My brother and I play soccer. ___ practice a lot.
The flowers are blooming. ___ look beautiful.
Paul is my neighbor. ___ lives next door.
Emily and her sister are musicians. ___ play guitar.
The book is open. ___ is interesting.
___ have a meeting at noon.
Sophie is an artist. ___ paints beautifully.
Andrew and I will visit soon. ___ can't wait.
The cat and dog are friends. ___ play together.
Your teacher is here. ___ wants to see you.
That computer is slow. ___ needs an update.
The kids are hungry. ___ want lunch.
The cake is delicious. ___ tastes great.
My friends and I study daily. ___ are very diligent.
James is on the phone. ___ is talking to his boss.
Lisa, when will ___ arrive?
The house is old. ___ needs repairs.
The birds are chirping. ___ sound lovely.
My grandparents live nearby. ___ visit often.
Emma and Liam are siblings. ___ share a room.
The chair is broken. ___ is missing a leg.
Rita likes to dance. ___ practices every weekend.
The movie is long. ___ lasts three hours.
Tom and Jerry are characters. ___ are famous.
The milk is cold. ___ is in the fridge.
John, ___ are very talented.
The students are studying. ___ have a test tomorrow.
Our dog is friendly. ___ loves everyone.
This table is heavy. ___ is made of wood.
Susan and Mark are doctors. ___ work at the hospital.
The soup is hot. ___ smells good.
Thomas is reading a book. ___ enjoys mysteries.
Julia and I like hiking. ___ go every weekend.
The tree is tall. ___ provides shade.
Dogs are loyal pets. ___ make great companions.
My cousin is visiting. ___ will stay for a week.
Maria, ___ always bring joy.
The car is fast. ___ can reach high speeds.
